name: arcmarket-subgraph
description: The Graph subgraph for ArcMarket NFT Marketplace on Arc Blockchain

scripts.deploy:local: graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ arcmarket/arcmarket && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 arcmarket/arcmarket
scripts.prepare: npm run update-config && npm run codegen && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run update-config && npm run codegen && npm run build && npm run deploy:studio
